text: aur tumamen se jo log beeviyaan chhod ke mar jaen to ye auraten chaar maheene das roz (idda bhar) apane ko roke (aur doosara nikaah na karen) phir jab (idde kee muddat) pooree kar le to shareeyat ke mutaabiq jo kuchh apane haq mein karen is baare mein tum par koee ilzaam nahin hai aur jo kuchh tum karate ho khuda us se khabaradaar hai
